TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AnnotationStore extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class AnnotationStore Implements IDisposable

summary.span: 在衍生類別中被覆寫時，表示用來寫入和讀取使用者註解的資料存放區。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents a data store for writing and reading user annotations.

summary.span: 將新的 加入存放區中。

span.span: Adds a new to the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當新加入存放區中的全域唯一識別碼 (GUID)屬性設定為新的值。When a new is added to the store its globally unique identifier (GUID) property is set to a new value. 當呼叫時，其會檢查屬性是否已經加入至存放區。When is called, its property is checked to see if the already has been added to the store. 如果已經加入，而且存在存放區中 (由其屬性)會擲回錯誤。If the already has been added and exists in the store (as determined by its property) an error is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 存放區中已經存在具有相同 屬性值的 。

span.span: An with the same property value already exists in the store.
has been called on the store.

summary.span: 發生於存放區中任何 上的錨點變更時。

span.span: Occurs when an anchor on any in the store changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用來監視變更的註釋而不需要在每個註冊的存放區中包含個別。The event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation contained in the store without the need to register on each individually.

summary.span: 發生於存放區中任何 上的作者變更時。

span.span: Occurs when an author on any in the store changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用來監視變更的註釋而不需要在每個註冊的存放區中包含個別。The event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation contained in the store without the need to register on each individually.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要將註解緩衝區中的資料立即寫入實體資料存放區。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store.

value.span: 如果要針對每項作業，將註解緩衝區中的資料立即寫入實體資料存放區，則為 ；如果要在應用程式明確呼叫 時，才將註解緩衝區中的資料寫入，則為 。

span.span: if data in annotation buffers is to be written immediately to the physical data store for each operation; otherwise, if data in the annotation buffers is to be written when the application explicitly calls .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用明確儲存模型的應用程式可以設定要`false`，並呼叫直接適當的時候。Applications that use an explicit-save model can set to `false` and call directly when appropriate. 使用隱含儲存模型的應用程式可以設定要`true`造成自動呼叫，在每個存放區作業 （新增、 刪除或修改）。Applications that use an implicit-save model can set to `true` to cause to be called automatically after every store operation (add, delete, or modify).

summary.span: 發生於存放區中任何 上的貨物變更時。

span.span: Occurs when a cargo on any in the store changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用來監視變更的註釋而不需要在每個註冊的存放區中包含個別。The event can be used to monitor changes to the annotation contained in the store without the need to register on each individually.

summary.span: 釋放存放區使用的所有 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式應該呼叫完成時。Applications should call when finished with the . 之後呼叫應用程式可以發行的所有參考允許記憶體回收行程回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling the application can release all references to the to allow the garbage collector to reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). 公用方法會呼叫受保護`(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數`true`釋放所有 managed 和 unmanaged 資源。The public method calls the protected `(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter of `true` to release all managed and unmanaged resources. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫之前的最後一個參考發行。Call before the last reference to the is released. 如果不呼叫將不會釋放資源，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫存放區的方法。If is not called, resources will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the store's method.

summary.span: 釋放存放區所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並可選擇釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the store and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此受保護方法會呼叫公用和方法。This protected method is called by the public and methods. 公用叫用受保護`(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。The public invokes the protected `(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數是`true`，持有任何受管理的所有資源的版本物件參考。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, releases all resources held by any managed objects that the references. 也會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。 also invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 確保終究會為這個存放區呼叫 。

span.span: Guarantees that will eventually be called for this store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫基底方法。This method overrides base method. 應用程式不應該呼叫直接。The application program should not call directly. 會自動叫用記憶體回收期間停用由呼叫方法。 is automatically invoked during garbage collection unless disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Finalize 方法和解構函式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
